sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, CardTitle } from '../components/Card'; import { VideoCameraIcon, ClockIcon, UserIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const Telemedicine = () => { const [selectedDoctor, setSelectedDoctor] = useState(null); const doctors = [ { id: 1, name: 'Dr. Sarah Johnson', specialty: 'Cardiology', rating: 4.8, available: true, image: 'https://placeholder-image-service.onrender.com/image/200x200?prompt=Professional female cardiologist doctor with stethoscope&id=doctor1' }, { id: 2, name: 'Dr. Michael Chen', specialty: 'Pediatrics', rating: 4.9, available: true, image: 'https://placeholder-image-service.onrender.com/image/200x200?prompt=Friendly male pediatrician doctor smiling&id=doctor2' }, { id: 3, name: 'Dr. Emily Rodriguez', specialty: 'Dermatology', rating: 4.7, available: false, image: 'https://placeholder-image-service.onrender.com/image/200x200?prompt=Professional female dermatologist doctor&id=doctor3' } ]; return (

Telemedicine

Connect with certified doctors from the comfort of your home. Get professional medical advice through secure video consultations.

{/* Available Doctors */}

Available Doctors

{doctors.map((doctor) => (

{doctor.name}

{doctor.specialty}

‚≠ê {doctor.rating} {doctor.available ? 'Available' : 'Busy'}
))}
{/* Consultation Info */}
Virtual Consultation

24/7 Availability

Consult doctors anytime, anywhere

Certified Professionals

All our doctors are verified and experienced

How it works:

  1. Choose a doctor from the list
  2. Schedule your consultation time
  3. Join the video call at the scheduled time
  4. Get professional medical advice
{selectedDoctor && (

Selected Doctor:

{selectedDoctor.name} - {selectedDoctor.specialty}

)}
); }; export default Telemedicine;
